titles.title: Correction Officer Protection Act of 1993
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide the penalty of death for certain murders of State and local correctional officers by incarcerated persons, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Correction Officer Protection Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal criminal code to provide for the death penalty for murders of State or local correctional officers by prisoners.
